text: FC Cherkasy-2 is a Ukrainian football team based in Cherkasy, Ukraine. The club has been featured regularly in the Ukrainian Second Division it serves as a junior team for the FC Dnipro Cherkasy franchise. Like most tributary teams, the best players are sent up to the senior team, meanwhile developing other players for further call-ups. title: FC Cherkasy-2
